content: The first thing you notice is the sound of rain lashing against the window
You awake in a cold room, breathing heavily and drenched in sweat
You look at the clock; 5AM. You can see the sunlight attempting to peek over the gloomy horizon from your bedroom window.
Leaving the comfort of your bed, you sweep over the window and peer out into the muted morning sunlight
Gazing over the room, you can still see the faint glow of coals from the fireplace in your bedroom
Closing your eyes, you let the rythmic sound of rain ease you back into sleep
